definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Soon, there was more sukiyaki in his belly than on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 很快地，進了他肚子的壽喜燒比掉在地板上的還多。

sentences.english: All that night my father sat on his bunk, pretending to pick up sukiyaki.
sentences.chinese: 那天一整晚我父親都坐在牀鋪上，裝着夾起壽喜燒。

definition: oden, Japanese dish made with boiled eggs, processed fish cakes, daikon radish, tofu etc in a kelp-based broth
noodles served with soy sauce/sesame butter etc
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
naengmyeon (Korean dish based on cold noodles in soup)
hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
